Package Client

The client that end users run on their computer. Requires a configuration file be provided called "client.conf" in the same folder the application is run from. The configuration file provides information regarding how to connect to the server.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    IServerConnector
    Interface for the server connector.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Main
    Client Main implements functions to initialise all the pages and switch between pages.
    MockServerConnector
    MockServerConnector imitates the ServerConnector class for unit testing purposes
    Page_AddAsset
    Page_AddAsset This class contains functionality for creating a jPanel for the add asset functionality
    Page_AddOrganisationalUnit
    Page_AddOrganisationalUnit class creates a panel for adding organisational units
    Page_AddUser
    Page_AddUser class generates jPanel for Add User
    Page_AssetHistory
    Page_AssetHistory Returns a jPanel that display asset history
    Page_AssetHistory.JTableModel
    JTableModel class creates a JTable to display history with two columns Code for implementing jTable with buttons adapted from this webpage https://www.cordinc.com/blog/2010/01/jbuttons-in-a-jtable.html
    Page_CurrentAssetOffers
    Page_CurrentAssetOffers class creates a jPanel for the viewing offers of a certain asset type functionality
    Page_CurrentAssetOffers.JTableModel
    JTableModel creates a new JTable for displaying test Code adapted from: https://www.cordinc.com/blog/2010/01/jbuttons-in-a-jtable.html
    Page_GetFile
    Page_GetFile class creates a jPanel for requesting information on how to communicate with the server
    Page_Login
    Page_Login class creates a panel for login functionality
    Page_Main
    Page_Main class returns a panel for main page functionality
    Page_ManageUnit
    Page_ManageUnit class creates panel for manage unit functionality
    Page_NewOffer
    Page_NewOffer class creates a new panel for new offer functionality
    Page_ResetPassword
    Page reset password creates jPanel for reset password functionality
    Page_ViewActiveOffers
    Page_ViewActiveOffers creates panel for viewing active offers functionality
    Page_ViewActiveOffers.JTableModel
    JTable creates all offers tables Code adapted from: https://www.cordinc.com/blog/2010/01/jbuttons-in-a-jtable.html
    Page_ViewActiveOffers.JTableModel2
    JTable2 creates my offers table Code adapted from: https://www.cordinc.com/blog/2010/01/jbuttons-in-a-jtable.html
    Page_ViewAssets
    Page_ViewAssets class creates panel for view assets functionality
    Page_ViewAssets.JTableModel
    Create view assets table Adapted from : https://www.cordinc.com/blog/2010/01/jbuttons-in-a-jtable.html
    Panel_UserBorder
    Panel user border class create panel for display at bottom of gui that allows users to navigate between pages It displays users name, unit and credits.
    ServerConnector
    ServerConnector class establishes a connection to server from client and handles queries.
    UpdateChecker
    Thread to periodically check back against the server for any updates
